sentence.Network_en: The Prosecutor looked toward Napoleon, waiting for him to thunder an objection.
sentence.Network_cn: 检察官朝拿破仑望去，等他大声抗议。

sentence.Network_en: He is under the delusion that he is Napoleon.
sentence.Network_cn: 他患了妄想症,认为自己是拿破仑.

sentence.Network_en: Beethoven at first dedicated his Heroes Symphony to Napoleon.
sentence.Network_cn: 最初贝多芬把他的《英雄》交响曲献给了拿破仑.
